title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, June 30
description: A terror attack in Turkey, and Brexit fallout works its way into US politics. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, campaign reporter Scott Detrow, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
